### Most used keyboard shortcuts

| Shortcut | Action |
|:--------:|:------:|
| Cmd + Shift + P | Open command palette |
| Ctrl + ` | Toggle terminal |
| Cmd + B | Toggle sidebar |
| Cmd + Ctrl + F | Toggle full screen |
